description: Checks for Microsoft/Windows updates using PSWindowsUpdate (installs the module if missing), logs available updates, then installs all available updates (AcceptAll, IgnoreReboot). Emits NDJSON (pre-install summary + per-update details + post-install results) and writes atomically to the Active Response log with .new fallback. Requires administrative privileges and internet access; a reboot may be required.

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Active Response NDJSON output path (atomic overwrite; falls back to .new if locked).
